alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Laurens; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 7:32PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Greenville and southern Spartanburg Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 732 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Greenville Downtown, or near Five Forks, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mauldin, Simpsonville, Five Forks, Fountain Inn, Woodruff, Duncan, Reidville, GSP Airport, Moore and Roebuck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Laurens; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville
